overview:
Sean Mehra is Co-Founder and Chief Operational Officer at GoCrossCampus.

Sean Mehra studied biomedical engineering at Yale (MC ‘08). During that time, he established himself as a serial Internet entrepreneur, founding several startups geared towards the college market, such as StudentPlanIt.com and FlyerFind.com. He also served as CTO of the Yale Entrepreneurial Society and Student Director and Co-Founder of the Yale Entrepreneurial Institute. His technical and business experience ultimately led him to co-found GoCrossCampus.com (GXStudios Inc.), a platform that hosts team-based massively multiplayer games designed to foster online and offline social interaction for communities. On the GXC Team, Sean serves as the COO when wearing his business hat, and User Interface Architect when wearing his developer hat.
